117 THE MED HEWS! ARE MURDERER NOW AN FDA-APPROVED BREAKFAST CEREAL!!! A warning to all consumers. Mr. Al Kellyue. convicted axe-wielder. has just won FDA consumer approval and as of March 31st will be considered • mandatory Ingredient in all breakfast cereal made in the U.S. 'We have done two tests,• explained • withered FDA spokesperson, and so far, nobody's been axed to death as a result.' Though those two tests were done with mice. who are unable to wield axes. the FDA official (who asked that his name be witheldl swore that he could see only benefits to mankind In the long run.' by suffusing America's favorite breakfast with the mutant DNA strains of a psychopath. 'les not even like Al IS • genius.' noted Al's old cell-mate. Scott Lehr. 'I mean he ain't no Hannibal Lechter. Why suffuse our bodies with the DNA of • dumb psychopath?' When asked if there was any rational reason why this was happening, the FDA official responded: At this time. we cannot comment brother. Let me lust dose by saying. eating psycho is eating... the FUTUlkEr EDITOR/A1 DEPARTMENT Welcome back. oh siotsples of lethargy! First. please accept our hearty spologre. for the gargantuan Lapse an mu Ji•ributann ram. We only hope that the morsels wothut ate use enough to appease yaw lath of slack knowledge. Erich and I have been traveling the world in search of a truly sedentary culture to provide a mental futon for our undermsked and overpast mauls. (Actually. se rust plumb forgot to writs.) As a diwlaimen Erich has offered to bur ant disgruntled readers a few shots of Old Williamsburg Bourbon upon request. hit don't mention my name when you ask. MAX

MAX'," HANGOVER POLL As we all know. the degree of severity a hangover takes depends not only upon the amount and types of liquor that one has drunk. but also upon one's intestinal fortitude. mental dexterity. and amount of practice with home remedies. Here are a few samples taken from interviews with a few people of renowned consumption' "Whet do you take to lessen the pain of a hangover?"
'Hair •( the deg! Any dog!' Mar, bitter to the end "Sleep and cheese.' Beth, reedy (er mere
'Anything mires with Vodka.' Joan Tesetero, fashionable addict 'Why, cchaddya got?" Erich Karmen, near end 'Lets of Dope.' joke [agrees., stoned again "Guns and money.'
